data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bergdahl, James C., Kavanaugh, David H. (2011): Two new species of Pterostichus Bonelli subgenus Pseudoferonina Ball (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Pterostichini) from the mountains of central Idaho, U. S. A. ZooKeys 104: 77-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.104.1272, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.104.1272
